Html:
Hi,
This is amazing project , I love it so much ..
I've one question which is : how could I change the language of tooltip of control box [Close ,Minimize and Maximize] ?
Thanks in advance.
Language specific text is stored in a Resources class. You'll need to create a satellite assembly for your language; see also this post

Ok
Thank you so much kozw ..

It seems that the satellite assembly won't work with tooltip of system buttons on ModernWindow.
